articles.author: David Ornstein
articles.title: World Cup 2030: Morocco, Spain and Portugal to host with opening three games in South America - The Athletic
articles.description:
Morocco, Spain and Portugal will host the 2030 World Cup — but the opening three matches of the tournament will be played in Uruguay, Argentina and Paraguay.
A South American bid had been put forward to host the entire tournament to mark the centenary of the …
articles.content:

articles.author: Daisy Dobrijevic
articles.title: NASA's Eclipse Explorer 2023 lets you track the Oct. 14 annular solar eclipse with new interactive map - Space.com
articles.description: The annular "ring of fire" solar eclipse will be visible across the Americas on Oct. 14, 2023.
